import pandas as pd

#variables
#coviddataurl = "https://opendata.ecdc.europa.eu/covid19/casedistribution/csv"
coviddataurl = 'abfss://covidanalysisfilesystem@covidanalysisstorage.dfs.core.windows.net/covid/Input/Covid.csv'
adlspath = 'abfss://covidanalysisfilesystem@covidanalysisstorage.dfs.core.windows.net/covid/'
rawfolderpathspark = adlspath + 'spark/bronze'
#rawfolderpathsql = adlspath + 'sql/bronze'
#rawfolderpathpipeline = adlspath + 'pipelines/bronze'

#read data from source
#Casesdf = pd.read_csv(coviddataurl, encoding='ISO-8859-1')
#raw_data = spark.createDataFrame(Casesdf.astype(str))
raw_data = spark.read.load(coviddataurl, format='csv', header=True)

raw_data.write.partitionBy('Year','Month','Day').csv(rawfolderpathspark, mode='overwrite', header = 'true')
raw_data.write.csv(rawfolderpathsql, mode='overwrite', header = 'true')
raw_data.write.csv(rawfolderpathpipeline, mode='overwrite', header = 'true')

raw_data.head()

#variables
adlspath = 'abfss://covidanalysisfilesystem@covidanalysisstorage.dfs.core.windows.net/covid/spark/'
rawfolderpath = adlspath + 'bronze'
transformfolderpath = adlspath + 'silver'

raw_data = spark.read.load(rawfolderpath, format='csv', header=True)

raw_data.write.partitionBy('Year','Month','Day').parquet(transformfolderpath,mode='overwrite')

raw_data.head()

#variables
adlspath = 'abfss://covidanalysisfilesystem@covidanalysisstorage.dfs.core.windows.net/covid/spark/'
transformfolderpath = adlspath + 'silver'
conformedfolderpath = adlspath + 'gold'

#reading the raw parquet file
raw_data = spark.read.load(transformfolderpath, format='parquet')

raw_data.show(5)

#extracting covid fact data
fact_covidimpact = raw_data[['dateRep','Year','Month','Day','geoId','cases','deaths']]
fact_covidimpact.write.partitionBy('Year','Month','Day').parquet(conformedfolderpath + '/fact/covidimpact', mode='overwrite')

#extracting 2018 population data
fact_population = raw_data [['geoId','popData2019']].distinct()
fact_population.write.parquet(conformedfolderpath + '/fact/population', mode='overwrite')

#extracting date dimension
dim_date = raw_data[['dateRep', 'day', 'month', 'year']].distinct()
dim_date.write.parquet(conformedfolderpath + '/dim/date', mode='overwrite')

#extracting geo dimension
dim_geo = raw_data[['geoId','countriesAndTerritories','countryterritoryCode','continentExp']].distinct()
dim_geo.write.parquet(conformedfolderpath + '/dim/geo', mode='overwrite')
